mapper.insert: insert into product (product_idx, product_name, product_price, product_desc, product_imgStr) values ((select nvl(max(product_idx), 50000) + 1 from product), #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_desc}, #{product_imgStr})
mapper.select: select * from cart where member_idx = #{member_idx} and product_idx = #{product_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_idx, product_idx, member_idx, product_name, product_amount, product_price, product_imgStr) values ((select nvl(max(cart_idx), 60000) + 1 from cart), #{product_idx}, #{member_idx}, #{product_name}, #{product_amount}, (#{product_amount} * #{product_price}), #{product_imgStr})
mapper.update: update cart set product_price = product_price + (#{product_amount} * #{product_price}), product_amount = product_amount + #{product_amount} where product_idx = #{product_idx}
mapper.select: select * from cart order by cart_idx
mapper.update: update cart set product_price = #{product_price}, product_amount = #{product_amount} where cart_idx = #{cart_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into orderTbl (order_idx, cart_idx, product_idx, member_idx, product_name, product_amount, product_price, order_price, product_imgStr) values (#{order_idx}, #{cart_idx}, #{product_idx}, #{member_idx}, #{product_name}, #{product_amount}, #{product_price}, #{order_price}, #{product_imgStr})
mapper.select: select * from orderTbl order by order_idx
select * from orderTbl where member_idx = #{member_idx} order by order_idx
